clip.quote: My grandmother was the very first female broker in the Quad Cities area back in 1954.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights a pioneering family history that adds depth to Brad's real estate story.
clip.suggested_hook: Discover the legacy of a real estate pioneer.

clip.quote: Always trust your wife... if we wouldn't have done that then, we would have been left in the dust.
clip.why_clipworthy: A humorous yet insightful reminder of the importance of adapting to change.
clip.suggested_hook: Why listening to your partner can transform your business.
